answers.answer: Since you didn't provide us with your mother's country of residence her doctor is the best choice for answers. Before leaving her doctors office your mother should have gotten a wealth of printed information on how to control and manage her diabetes. A list of recommended home glucose test meters should have been part of that package. Good luck -
Sometimes the docotor has test meters supplied by drug companies.  Ask if they have a free one available!
If she has health insurance which meters will they pay for the strips?
